name: Suidie Racoon
description:
Learn by Tr....Dying

You are a cute little racoon and you want to get to your treasured trash. To get to the trash you have to overcome obstacles.

You are so unexperience that you have to learn everything. The only way you learn stuff is the hard way. So you try and try and die and die to learn.

Team

Veit Isopp:

Game Design, Backend Programming

Alessandro Mattivi:

Game Design, Level Design, Frontend Programming

Stephanie Kühnl:

Character Design, 2D Animation

Ceren Dastanoglu:

Asset Design, Audio, Sound
